page.title: 11RABBITS
page.content: {Mr.W.Sichel}of Upper{Breckan}has an occupation which is unique in Sanday. In May 1983{Mr.Sichel}started breeding rabbits for their meat.He started out with 3 does and 1 buck,and has now got 44 pure bred{Californian}does and 5 bucks. Originally the rabbits were kept in a caravan,but recently a huge shed has been erected to house them.The shed contains 101 cages,and is 64 feet long,24 feet wide and 10 feet high. To make it a profitable business each rabbit must have a litter of at least 10 young.The young rabbits are killed from 11_12 weeks and are sold either in{Sanday}or{Eday},although he hopes to expand his market to the whole of Orkney and hopefully{Shetland}in September 1985. 1 pound of farm bred rabbit meat retails at a price of{Â£1.20.
